verses.verse: And Dinah<WH1783> the daughter<WH1323> of Leah,<WH3812> which<WH834> she bore<WH3205> to Jacob,<WH3290> went<WH3318> out to see<WH7200> the daughters<WH1323> of the land.<WH776>

And when Shechem<WH7927> the son<WH1121> of Hamor<WH2544> the Hivite,<WH2340> prince<WH5387> of the country,<WH776> saw<WH7200> her, he took<WH3947> her, and lay<WH7901> with her, and defiled<WH6031> her.
And his soul<WH5315> joined<WH1692> to Dinah<WH1783> the daughter<WH1323> of Jacob,<WH3290> and he loved<WH157> the damsel,<WH5291> and spoke<WH1696> kindly<WH5921> <WH3820> to the damsel.<WH5291>
And Shechem<WH7927> spoke<WH559> to his father<WH1> Hamor,<WH2544> saying,<WH559> Get<WH3947> me this<WH2063> damsel<WH3207> to wife.<WH802>

And Jacob<WH3290> heard<WH8085> that he had defiled<WH2930> Dinah<WH1783> his daughter:<WH1323> now his sons<WH1121> were with his cattle<WH4735> in the field:<WH7704> and Jacob<WH3290> held<WH2790> his peace<WH2790> until<WH5704> they were come.<WH935>
And Hamor<WH2544> the father<WH1> of Shechem<WH7927> went<WH3318> out to Jacob<WH3290> to commune<WH1696> with him.

And the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> out of the field<WH7704> when they heard<WH8085> it: and the men<WH582> were grieved,<WH6087> and they were very<WH3966> wroth,<WH2734> because<WH3588> he had worked<WH6213> folly<WH5039> in Israel<WH3478> in lying<WH7901> with Jacob's<WH3290> daughter:<WH1323> which<WH3651> thing<WH3651> ought not to be done.<WH6213>

And Hamor<WH2544> communed<WH1696> with them, saying,<WH559> The soul<WH5315> of my son<WH1121> Shechem<WH7927> longs<WH2836> for your daughter:<WH1323> I pray<WH4994> you give<WH5414> her him to wife.<WH802>
And make you marriages<WH2859> with us, and give<WH5414> your daughters<WH1323> to us, and take<WH3947> our daughters<WH1323> to you.
And you shall dwell<WH3427> with us: and the land<WH776> shall be before<WH6440> you; dwell<WH3427> and trade<WH5503> you therein, and get you possessions<WH270> therein.
And Shechem<WH7927> said<WH559> to her father<WH1> and to her brothers,<WH251> Let me find<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your eyes,<WH5869> and what<WH834> you shall say<WH559> to me I will give.<WH5414>
Ask me never so much<WH3966> <WH7235> dowry<WH4119> and gift,<WH4976> and I will give<WH5414> according as you shall say<WH559> to me: but give<WH5414> me the damsel<WH5291> to wife.<WH802>

And the sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> answered<WH6030> Shechem<WH7927> and Hamor<WH2544> his father<WH1> deceitfully,<WH4820> and said,<WH1696> because<WH834> he had defiled<WH2930> Dinah<WH1783> their sister:<WH269>

And they said<WH559> to them, We cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> to give<WH5414> our sister<WH269> to one<WH376> that is uncircumcised;<WH6190> for that were a reproach<WH2781> to us:
But in this<WH2063> will we consent<WH225> to you: If<WH518> you will be as we be, that every<WH3605> male<WH2145> of you be circumcised;<WH4135>

Then will we give<WH5414> our daughters<WH1323> to you, and we will take<WH3947> your daughters<WH1323> to us, and we will dwell<WH3427> with you, and we will become<WH1961> one<WH259> people.<WH5971>
But if<WH518> you will not listen<WH8085> to us, to be circumcised;<WH4135> then will we take<WH3947> our daughter,<WH1323> and we will be gone.<WH1980>
And their words<WH1697> pleased<WH3190> <WH5869> Hamor,<WH2544> and Shechem<WH7927> Hamor's<WH2544> son.<WH1121>

And the young<WH5288> man deferred<WH309> not to do<WH6213> the thing,<WH1697> because<WH3588> he had delight<WH2654> in Jacob's<WH3290> daughter:<WH1323> and he was more<WH3513> honorable<WH3513> than all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of his father.<WH1>
And Hamor<WH2544> and Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> came<WH935> to the gate<WH8179> of their city,<WH5892> and communed<WH1696> with the men<WH582> of their city,<WH5892> saying,<WH559>

These<WH428> men<WH582> are peaceable<WH8003> with us; therefore let them dwell<WH3427> in the land,<WH776> and trade<WH5503> therein; for the land,<WH776> behold,<WH2009> it is large<WH7342> enough<WH3027> for them; let us take<WH3947> their daughters<WH1323> to us for wives,<WH802> and let us give<WH5414> them our daughters.<WH1323>

Only<WH389> herein<WH2063> will the men<WH582> consent<WH225> to us for to dwell<WH3427> with us, to be one<WH259> people,<WH5971> if<WH518> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> among us be circumcised,<WH4135> as they are circumcised.<WH4135>
Shall not their cattle<WH4735> and their substance<WH7075> and every<WH3605> beast<WH929> of their's be our's? only<WH389> let us consent<WH225> to them, and they will dwell<WH3427> with us.

And to Hamor<WH2544> and to Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> listened<WH8085> all<WH3605> that went<WH3318> out of the gate<WH8179> of his city;<WH5892> and every<WH3605> male<WH2145> was circumcised,<WH4135> all that went<WH3318> out of the gate<WH8179> of his city.<WH5892>

And it came<WH1961> to pass on the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> when they were sore,<WH3510> that two<WH8147> of the sons<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> Simeon<WH8095> and Levi,<WH3878> Dinah's<WH1783> brothers,<WH251> took<WH3947> each man<WH376> his sword,<WH2719> and came<WH935> on the city<WH5892> boldly,<WH983> and slew<WH2026> all<WH3605> the males.<WH2145>

And they slew<WH2026> Hamor<WH2544> and Shechem<WH7927> his son<WH1121> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and took<WH3947> Dinah<WH1783> out of Shechem's<WH7927> house,<WH1004> and went<WH3318> out.
The sons<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> on the slain,<WH2491> and spoiled<WH962> the city,<WH5892> because<WH834> they had defiled<WH2930> their sister.<WH269>
They took<WH3947> their sheep,<WH6629> and their oxen,<WH1241> and their asses,<WH2543> and that which<WH834> was in the city,<WH5892> and that which<WH834> was in the field,<WH7704>
And all<WH3605> their wealth,<WH2428> and all<WH3605> their little<WH2945> ones, and their wives<WH802> took they captive,<WH7617> and spoiled<WH962> even all<WH3605> that was in the house.<WH1004>

And Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to Simeon<WH8095> and Levi,<WH3878> You have troubled<WH5916> me to make me to stink<WH887> among the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776> among the Canaanites<WH3669> and the Perizzites:<WH6522> and I being few<WH4962> in number,<WH4557> they shall gather<WH622> themselves together against<WH5921> me, and slay<WH5221> me; and I shall be destroyed,<WH8045> I and my house.<WH1004>
And they said,<WH559> Should he deal<WH6213> with our sister<WH269> as with an harlot?<WH2181>
